text:
* Restore from tag tiddler
* Configure no-split as default at document level
* Button: Remove tiddler from noto document
* Button: Combine next X tiddlers
* Make export to wikitext respect tiddler type
* Tools to allow movement of tiddlers inside document tree
** simple up/down movement
** Movement by mark
** Movement of group of tiddlers
* Improve performance with DynaView ?
* Sidebar configuration panel?
* ~~Cloning/versioning working tiddler~~ (6/5)
* ~~Bookmark or "star" current tiddler. Document level configuration for defining bookmark tag~~ (6/4)
* ~~Reset working tiddler~~ (6/5)
* ~~New tiddlers take type of originating tiddler~~ (6/4)
* ~~Backup tag tiddler~~ (6/5)
* ~~Wrap settings in style (nw-settings)~~ (6/6)
* ~~Show tag pill in settings for 3rd party operations~~ (6/6)
title: The plan / Roadmap-1 8 1 1
